body_html:
@skye I understand :) I'm working on a project where optimising execution time is a big deal and copying data is expensive, so I'd appreciate it if you can come up with the C++ feature as soon as you can. I'm actually thinking of excluding this copy time for my calculated total time.

As for your C API suggestion, would it work normally with C++ code? (I guess yes)

As for your C API suggestion, would it work normally with C++ code? (I guess yes)
